text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del mcheasa robsa anak( mou ha- meat) ban brakeasa tha trong brakadchea nung banhchoun anak del thveubeab puokke( yeahou ti) daoy tearounakamm da akrak towkean puokke rhaut dl thngai barlok . pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anakchea anak dak tondakamm yeang rhsa bamphot haey pitabrakd nasa trong mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
